tool_description: Calculates applicable tax rates based on customer location, product types, and current tax regulations for accurate invoice tax computation.

billing_address.description: Customer billing address for tax jurisdiction determination

shipping_address.description: Shipping address if different from billing

invoice_date.description: Date of invoice for tax rate determination

error_messages: Invalid address format: Billing address format is not recognized. Provide a complete address with city, state/province, and postal code.
Tax jurisdiction not found: Cannot determine tax jurisdiction from the provided address. Verify address accuracy.
Product category invalid: One or more product categories are not recognized. Use valid product category codes.
Tax rates unavailable: Tax rates for the specified date and jurisdiction are not available. Contact tax services.
Tax exemption invalid: Customer tax exempt status cannot be verified. Provide valid exemption documentation.
usage: Provide billing_address, product_categories, and invoice_date to calculate applicable tax rates. Optionally specify shipping_address if different from billing and set customer_tax_exempt if applicable.

tax_jurisdiction.description: Determined tax jurisdiction for the transaction

tax_rates.description: Array of applicable tax rates with descriptions

total_tax_rate.description: Combined tax rate as a percentage
